items.x-path: /state/protocol-routing/ipv4-routes/ipv4-route/{obj_type vrf_name query_protocol dest_addr mask_addr nexthop_index nexthop_addr}/

configuration_schema.description: The netconf module to describe the configuration of route protocol management model.

courier.description: This model includes the description of ip max-routes configuration.

ip-maxroutes.description: The netconf module to describe the function of set maximum routes and warning percent of global route table, this function can not limit the routes number, but only send users an alarm when the routes number reaches the threshold value.

max-routes.description: The max-routes node means the maximum of the global route table.This node and warning-percent node must be set together.

warning-percent.description: Warning threshold value. When the routes of the global route table exceeded the threshold value, an alarm will be send to users. This node and max-routes node must be set together.

ipv6-maxroutes.description: Set maximum routes and warning percent of IPv6 global route table. This function can not limit the routes number, but only send users an alarm when the routes number reaches the threshold value.

max-routes.description: The max-routes node means the maximum of the IPv6 global route table. This node and warning-percent node must be set together.

warning-percent.description: Warning threshold value. When the routes of the IPv6 global route table exceeded the threshold value, an alarm will be send to users. This node and max-routes node must be set together.

ipv4-maxribs.description: The netconf module to describe the function of set maximum ribs and warning percent of total ribs table, this function can not limit the ribs number, but only send users an alarm when the ribs number reaches the threshold value.

warning-percent.description: Warning threshold value. When the count of the total IPv4 rib table exceeded the threshold value, an alarm will be send to users.

ipv6-maxribs.description: The netconf module to describe the function of set maximum ribs and warning percent of total ribs table, this function can not limit the ribs number, but only send users an alarm when the ribs number reaches the threshold value.

warning-percent.description: Warning threshold value. When the count of the total IPv6 rib table exceeded the threshold value, an alarm will be send to users.

direct-route-tracks.description: The SAMGR track configurations of direct route.

direct-route-track.description: The SAMGR track configurations of direct route.

interface.description: The interface name of direct route.

state_schema.description: The information querying of route protocol management model.

protocol-routing.description: The information querying of protocol route.

ipv4-routes.description: The information querying of IPv4 protocol route.

ipv4-route.description:
The list of IPv4 protocol route information querying.
For all routes of public network, need select obj-type(1).
For the special protocol routes of public network, need select obj-type(1) and query-protocol.
For exact match the routes of public network according to prefix, need select obj-type(1), dest-addr and mask-addr.
For exact match the routes of public network according to prefix and protocol, need select obj-type(1), query-protocol, dest-addr and mask-addr.
For all routes of one VPN, need select obj-type(2) and vrf-name.
For the special protocol routes of one VPN, need select obj-type(2), vrf-name and query-protocol.
For exact match the routes of one VPN according to prefix, need select obj-type(2), vrf-name, dest-addr and mask-addr.
For exact match the routes of one VPN according to prefix and protocol, need select obj-type(2), vrf-name, query-protocol, dest-addr and mask-addr.

obj-type.description: The type of network. The "GLOBAL" means the public route, the "VPN" means private route.

vrf-name.description: The name of the private VPN network.

dest-addr.description: The destination IP address of route.

ipv4-route.x-key: obj-type vrf-name query-protocol dest-addr mask-addr nexthop-index nexthop-addr
